meanings.definition: Occurring or appearing after an eruption.
meanings.sent1: The posteruptive lava flow slowly made its way down the volcano.
meanings.sent2: The scientists studied the posteruptive changes in the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The posteruptive ash cloud played hide-and-seek with the sun.
meanings.sent4: The posteruptive silence that followed the eruption was eerie.
meanings.sent5: The posteruptive aftermath of the volcano was both devastating and fascinating.

meanings.sent1: The posteruptive tremors were felt throughout the region.
meanings.sent2: The posteruptive smoke billowed from the crater.
meanings.sent3: The posteruptive debris created a messy situation for the cleanup crew.
meanings.sent4: The posteruptive calm after the storm was a welcome relief.
meanings.sent5: The posteruptive aftermath of the eruption required immediate attention.

meanings.sent1: The posteruptive mudslides posed a new threat to the area.
meanings.sent2: The posteruptive changes in temperature affected the local wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The posteruptive steam rising from the volcano looked like a giant teapot.
meanings.sent4: The posteruptive silence was broken by the sound of falling rocks.
meanings.sent5: The posteruptive landscape was forever altered by the volcanic activity.
